docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs
docs.text:
Bases: BaseModel

This is the sales class that will be used in the contract

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default email

EmailStr

required date

date

required hour

time

required value

PositiveFloat

required quantity

PositiveInt

required product

str

required Source code in contract.py 
class Sales(BaseModel):
    """
    This is the sales class that will be used in the contract

    Args:
        email: EmailStr
        date: date
        hour: time
        value: PositiveFloat
        quantity: PositiveInt
        product: str
    """
    email: EmailStr
    date: date
    hour: time
    value: PositiveFloat
    quantity: PositiveInt
    product: str

For full documentation visit mkdocs.org.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
